talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>

<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(What should I do with this Elf...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
Then I shall continue with a plan B.
(Citridel's eyes are sparkling)
<html>$Noisy and Energetic Fellas II$</html>

$Elf Guard Citridel$
This is my ultimate final attempt... Hehehe... The gust of wind blows from the west... If the other book made you laugh every 10 seconds, you'll be giggling to yourself every 9 seconds with this one!!
(Citridel proudly hands over the book after saying things you don't understand...)

$Elf Guard Citridel$
You look like you don't trust me. I've seen those eyes before... That's how the Elder looks at the King!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Is it that much of a secret…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
But this is my final... uerrgh... my stomach...
If the other Elves find out I've let an outsider read it, they'll be angry. Please keep this a secret!

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Muahaha! I hope this will make you laugh and we will talk happily after you read this boooook ueerrrrgh... Krrahhahaaa…(Though you're concerned about Citridel, go and read the book first... Go to the Corridor of Tangled Memories…)

$The Book$
What a shame! This is utterly deplorable!

$The Book$
As a royal chef, how can I stand around and do nothing about the tragedy? I agree with you a hundred percent, Rubinart! You are truly a wise man! It will be a disaster for our descendents if we let the situation continue!

$The Book$
Ah... The tragedy began a day before Feder's birthday...

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4656_qu_01.ogg}
I'm serious, Meriendel.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_01.ogg}
….Elizabeth, you're not the only one who's serious here… (Meriendel is staring at a grotesque-looking dancing pork belly)

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_02.ogg}
So this is... braised pork?
It's not some monster that broke in?

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4656_qu_02.ogg}
A monster?! Of course not! I'm sure I used the correct ingredients. It's just that I used a little magic to make it taste better...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_03.ogg}
…Elizabeth, although I'm your friend…(Meriendel holds Elizabeth's hands tightly) I don't think you should do this. This is worse than poison. Please think about it again, Elizabeth.

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4656_qu_03.ogg}
But as Feder's fiancee, I should be cooking something for his birthday…!

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_04.ogg}
Erm... He would appreciate it a lot more if you did something else... Not all fiancees need to cook... Oh, Rubinart! You're here at the right time!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_01.ogg}
(He is staring at the belly dancing pork that Elizabeth made with a disgusted look on his face) What is that thing? Do you summon monsters now? It's ugly...

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4656_qu_04.ogg}
Wh-what do you mean? That's braised pork.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_02.ogg}
…?!?!?? Braised pork?!?! Or raised pork?!?! Don't try to make an exotic dish too exotic!! No wonder all the chefs were crying outside! Don't you think you've gone too overboard? Why are you guys suddenly making such a fuss in the kitchen!!

$Princess Elizabeth$
It's Feder's birthday tomorrow. How can you not know, you're his friend!
You must have had birthday celebrations before too.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Huh? I don't even know when my birthday is.
No one would bother to remember such things... you know how old I am.
Anyway, I didn't know.

$Archer Meriendel$
…Erm….

$Princess Elizabeth$
Oh… I'm sorry.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_03.ogg}
What for? Anyway, do something about that pork... It's keeping the chefs away from preparing for the big day tomorrow. Do you know how devastated they are right now?!

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4656_qu_05.ogg}
I... I only wanted to cook something for Feder... It's his first birthday after we got engaged... (Elizabeth looks discouraged)
But Feder's strong, so won't he eat this for me?

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_05.ogg}
(Meriendel turns pale and vigorously shakes her head to show her disapproval) Ah…Elizabeth! Why don't you just look at what I'm doing and follow closely? Wouldn't that be a good idea? Let's quickly get that off the table... I'm sure you'll make a wonderful dish if you just follow me.

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4656_qu_06.ogg}
Really...?

$Archer Meriendel$
(Meriendel exchanges glances with Rubinart and he quickly throws the dancing pork out of the window when Elizabeth isn't looking and leaves the kitchen. He seems to be planning to burn it until there are no traces of it left in the world.)

$Princess Elizabeth${sound:npc_Elizabeth_4656_qu_07.ogg}
Oh my Braised Pork No.1!! Rubinart! Why...!?!!?

$Archer Meriendel$
He probably went to fight it... I mean clean it up! Let's make something new. Chefs! Please come in. We'll be cooking quietly in one corner. (The chefs enter cautiously like they are frightened...)

$The Book$
Then we started cooking like we were possessed by kitchen gods. We were running out of time so we cooked in a hurry, and Elizabeth luckily followed Meriendel's example well and did her best... but...

$The Book$
We never knew that tragedy could strike again... Sob...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_04.ogg}
…(He frowns as he smells his shirt) Ah I can still smell it even after washing it a few times... I never expected the pork to spit out vomit when it burned. What kind of magic did the sorceresses create? Humans really use their intelligence in the wrong way sometimes.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_05.ogg}
…(Slams the kitchen doors open) Are you guys done by now?
AAAARGH!!!!

$The Book$
Right then! What caught Rubinart's eyes were none other than Braised Pork No.2, 3, 4 and Steak No.1, 2, Salad No.1, Cake No.1 and Wine Jelly No.1 standing in a line...!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_06.ogg}
…This is insane..!! Elizabeth, what have you done?!

$Princess Elizabeth$
It wasn't me alone... My sorceress friends came over to help out a little...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_06.ogg}
…(She stares at the scene blankly) How can this happen when all I did was take a short toilet break... I feel dizzy...

$The Book$
Even Meriendel felt dizzy by what was going on. How do you think we felt? It was chaos! Oh... Sorceresses... Why do they hate food so much!! Why do they keep doing that to innocent ingredients...!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…You'll be the death of me!!! Elizabeth, that thing will vomit when you burn it so just freeze it when I'm still talking nicely, all right? Just don't say a thing and freeze it RIGHT NOW!! Then bury everything underground. Get the soldiers in here!!!

$Princess Elizabeth$
Okay…!!(Elizabeth scrambles to freeze the food with the other sorceresses. The food she made squeaks and squeals like they aren't edible... and the soldiers carry them away with disgusted faces... This is a scene of pandemonium.)

$The Book$
After cleaning up the monsterous culinary disaster... the kitchen was as empty as it could be... Not much time was left until Feder's birthday so we were devastated... But Rubinart quietly held a pot and a ladle in his hands and shouted....

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_07.ogg}
You're chefs!! There still are some ingredients left and you have the pots and pans! That means you can still cook something! Don't give up if you have ingredients and equipment in your sight! We even cooked tree barks in the place where I'm from!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_08.ogg}
We even made dozens of different dishes with that...! If you are real chefs, don't give up until you use up all the ingredients!! Don't you hear the cries of the ingredients begging for you to use them?!! You are chefs, not sorceresses! That means... YOU CAN COOK!!!!

$The Book$
Those touching words...!! They sparked the fighting spirit in us!! He was right. We were different from the monster-conjuring amateurs! We could COOK! We immediately calmed ourselves down and grabbed our ladles and knives. But there was one more thing that impressed us...!!!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
You know, at the place where I'm from... (Rubinart is holding a pan in each hand and starts stir-frying like a 5-star chef. This is more than cooking...!! This is... art...!!! The chefs and even Meriendel can't take their eyes off from the amazing show...!

$Chef$
Ru-Rubinart… Who are you exactly?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_09.ogg}
I just roughly know how to cook. I make something edible at least, so you guys should do whatever you can too.

$The Book$
So humble!! So determined!! Thanks to him, we could carry on with Feder's birthday party without a problem...!!
His birthday party that year was much more impressive than usual! That was the first and the last time that Meriendel who was a vegetarian appreciated the taste of meat...!!

$Archer Meriendel$
No way… This isn't greasy at all and it's so delicious. It is meat but only the flavours have been kept and... how should I put it... It's savoury...? Rubinart, how do you make something like this?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(He can't really use the fork after straining his arms too much with the pots and pans) I just learnt it roughly… I didn't have time to make it perfect. Don't praise me too much...

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_07.ogg}
But it really tastes great… Rubinart, you're so great. Is there anything that you don't know how to do?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_10.ogg}
I know many things because I lived for a long time... If you live as long as me, cooking will be the easiest thing to do. But is it seasoned well? I didn't put much seasoning because you like it bland. Can you get me one? My arms are so tired I can't pick anything up... Gee, this is the first time my arms hurt like this.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_08.ogg}
Sure... Here.
(Meriendel picks a piece of meat with her fork and feeds him)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_11.ogg}
(Rubinart chews the meat Meriendel gave him. He looks satisfied.)
Hmm, not bad... I'll make the real thing for you later when we have time.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_09.ogg}
Oh, you don't have to trouble yourself…

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_4656_qu_12.ogg}
It's a rare occasion for a dragon to cook for you. Accept it when you can. But don't call Elizabeth along. I don't want my ingredients to turn into dancing monsters too.

$Archer Meriendel${sound:npc_Marriendel_4656_qu_10.ogg}
Haha, all right.

$The Book$
Normally the chefs would have been jealous to see such a lovey-dovey couple, but they supported Rubinart this time...!
Besides, Rubinart even...

$The Book$
...he even proposed to Feder to pass a law that [Bar all sorceresses from entering the kitchen]...!! What a brave thing to do!! The sorceresses didn't dare to rebut his proposal! Just how do the sorceresses usually cook?!

$The Book$
But Feder replied that it was [excessive prejudice] and didn't pass it... But... all the chefs in the palace would have agreed that such a law was necessary... What a pity.

$The Book$
But we thought maybe there would one day be a sorceress who can could make decent food... Though Feder was hopeful about that future, we are still guarding the kitchen in the present, preparing for a surprise attack from the sorceresses who might barge in anytime... We are always on alert.

$The Book$
Besides, Rubinart's famous words would always be etched in our hearts…!!

${user_nick}$
(Wow this was an exciting story...!! The struggle of real men protecting what's precious...! It's making me cry...!!)

${user_nick}$
(Wow, I need to be careful... I didn't know it was that serious...!! I have tears in my eyes now...!!)

${user_nick}$
(What? So this was a tradition...? No... I'm not like them... No way...)

${user_nick}$
(...There's another love story at the end... Right, Citridel... Did you laugh from beginning to the end with this book too...? Hahaha... I should go back. I did my best.)

$Elf Guard Citridel$
(*Stares blankly*)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Tears are streaming down, I can't see.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
AHH!!! I wasn't dozing off! Nope!! Oh it's you, {user_nick}… Right! How did you find the book?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I seriously don't understand her sense of humour)</html>
<html>(Was there nothing to eat in Lunascent?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Citridel$
But don't you think it's funny? He could make dozens of different dishes using tree barks? Haha, that's exaggerating!! I only know 10!! Hahaha!! Wahahahaha!!!!

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Erm... Lately, my friends have been telling me I laugh at the weird parts too. Have I really become weird?
But it sure was funny.

$Elf Guard Citridel$
Hmm...(Citridel looks discouraged. Go and look for her Elf friends... You must save Citridel in whatever way you can... For the peace of Anu Arendel... Go to Elf Guard Basha.)

$Elf Guard Basha$
(Basha looks deeply worried too)Ah, {user_nick}. What should we do….

$Elf Guard Basha$
Yes. She used to be a bright and dilligent girl. I don't know how she changed so much…
Now I don't even know what she's laughing about or what she's thinking...(Basha looks worried)

$Elf Guard Basha$
But I did some research on my own. It seems like she laughs when the Red Dragon appears in the story.
Could it be that the stress she got from the invasion of the Red Dragon and the quarrel between the Elder and the King had some unfortunate effect on her brain?

$Elf Guard Basha$
So I found a way to make Citridel normal again!
<html>$Quest Completed$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Don't tell me that was the note…?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Elf Guard Basha$
Hehe... You'll be surprised! I'm no longer the coward who kept relying on you. If you see here... AHH!(A weird piece of paper flies from Basha's hand in the wind) NOOOO!!

$Elf Guard Basha$
…Hahaha….
The wind is exceptionally strong today!! Haha….

$Elf Guard Basha$
Erm... I'll go and get it back so please wait for me!! Please do it for Citridel!! Even the Elder is concerned. I should do something about it too!!
(Basha's eyes are sparkling. Maybe you can hear her plan when you talk to her later)

journal.title: Noisy and Energetic Fellas II 1
journal.contents:
Talk to Citridel.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Guard Citridel

journal.title: Noisy and Energetic Fellas II 2
journal.contents:
Citridel said she has a really funny book and asked you to read it alone…
If that's what would make your poor friend happy... Go to the Corridor of Tangled Memories to read the book.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Corridor of Tangled Memories
journal.destination: Read the second book at the Corridor of Tangled Memories
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Corridor of Tangled Memories and read the book.

journal.title: Noisy and Energetic Fellas II 3
journal.contents:
This time the story was about Rubinart sacrificing himself yet again...
Return the book to Citridel.

Anu Arendel (Tree of Life Entrance) - Elf Guard Citridel
journal.todo_msg: You've finished reading the book. Return it to Citridel.

journal.title: Noisy and Energetic Fellas II 4
journal.contents:
Citridel has become weird, that seems certain.
To make Citridel normal again, ask for help from her colleague Basha.

Anu Arendel (Forest of New Moon Entrance) - Elf Guard Basha
journal.destination: Devise a plan with Elf Guard Basha
journal.todo_msg: Citridel is becoming more and more weird… Ask for help from Elf Guard Basha.
